extendedInfo.description: This the admoin tool for BadCompany2 game servers.Source: BC2: Server Admin Tool R27 by Mark McNeely JrNew: - fixed some errors and crashes;- in chat add server messages (optional);- while chat tab is open - screen always on;- some ui changes;You can kick, kill, ban, move players, change server settings, change maps, reserved slots etc.For BattleField BadCompany2 server admin only!
